description: Koi memory hooks - auto-recall on start, save before compaction

hooks.command: echo '[koi] MANDATORY: Call recall() NOW before doing anything else. Your past work and decisions are stored in memories - do not skip this step or you will waste time re-investigating solved problems.'

echo '[koi] CRITICAL: Context compaction imminent. Call remember() IMMEDIATELY to save your current progress, decisions, and reasoning. Anything not saved will be LOST. Do not ask permission - just save it NOW.'
